strings.Value: "This Rushlight tournament is such a wonderful idea. I'm so amazed – ravished by the celebrations people hold!"
"A deva, who has looked upon the gods with his own eyes, and traveled freely between the planes, is 'ravished' by the sight of a drunken crowd. Delightful."
"I still can't believe you're a real deva! That's so interesting! How mysterious it all is, and what happens there, beyond the boundary of death…"
"I have no idea what such a neatly-dressed fellow like yourself could find so interesting about a bunch of drunken mugs at a festival."
